mapper.select: SELECT PM_GRADE , DATE_FORMAT(AIR_TIME, '%Y%m%d') AS RESULT_DATE , (COUNT(PM_GRADE) / ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM air_quality WHERE DATE_FORMAT(AIR_TIME, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d')) ) * 100 AS PM_PERCENT FROM air_quality WHERE DATE_FORMAT(AIR_TIME, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') GROUP BY PM_GRADE ORDER BY FIELD(PM_GRADE, '좋음', '보통', '나쁨', '매우 나쁨');

SELECT FPM_GRADE , DATE_FORMAT(AIR_TIME, '%Y%m%d') AS RESULT_DATE , (COUNT(FPM_GRADE) / ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM air_quality WHERE DATE_FORMAT(AIR_TIME, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d')) ) * 100 AS FPM_PERCENT FROM air_quality WHERE DATE_FORMAT(AIR_TIME, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') GROUP BY FPM_GRADE ORDER BY FIELD(FPM_GRADE, '좋음', '보통', '나쁨', '매우 나쁨');
